mapper.select: SELECT sys_user.id, sys_user.user_name, sys_user.nick_name, sys_user.status, sys_user.avatar, sys_user.email, sys_user.phone, sys_user.sex, sys_user.create_time, sys_user.update_time, sys_user.del_flag FROM sys_user WHERE id >= (select id from sys_user ORDER BY id limit #{page},1) AND del_flag = 0 limit #{size}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM sys_user WHERE del_flag=0
